str2: Therefore, then. Apparently a primary word; certainly, or accordingly.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Middle or Passive - Genitive Masculine Plural
str2: From sun and erchomai; to convene, depart in company with, associate with, or, cohabit.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.
No, not. Also ouk, and ouch a primary word; the absolute negative adverb; no or not.
Of the Lord, special to the Lord. From kurios; belonging to the Lord.
A dinner, an afternoon or evening meal. From the same as dapane; dinner, i.e. The chief meal.
